model

Class Digram

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Digram.BasicDigram

  • public class Digram
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class for a replacement digram which is called Digram. A Digram is an entry in the DigramList and the digram specifies how a replacement can be performed on the graph. To the digram matching occurrence are stored in the digram.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen
